name: Shadows Light RPG
description:
"Shadows Light RPG" is an apocalitic RPG indie game, with all the elements that RPG games have and a very enjoyable gameplay.

The world is full of darkness. A world that was once peaceful, Galem, has now become a complete mess. The darkness have turned peace into chaos, and no one was prepared for that. All the former habitats of Galem have now fell, looks like there is no solution, but a group appears with what looks like a solution, you have to discover their plan.
A great adventure awaits you trying to save Galem, you will face challenges that at first seem insurmountable, but you will have to become strong with the passage of time and get to save all those children, men, women, workers, old people, doctors or teachers that used to live in Galem.

What to expect:

-Post-apocalyptic environment.

-Great challenge.

-Good story and plot

How to play:

-WASD to move.

-Space to interact.
